abstract: The punishment for Raj Rajaratnam, the former chief of the Galleon Group, though less than the government sought, was the longest prison sentence ever for insider trading.
snippet: The punishment for Raj Rajaratnam, the former chief of the Galleon Group, though less than the government sought, was the longest prison sentence ever for insider trading.

headline.main: Galleon Chief Sentenced to 11-Year Term in Insider Case
headline.print_headline: 11 Years in Jail For Fund Chief In Stock Deals
